Name: Net VR Theater
About the game: ğ—©ğ—¶ğ—¿ğ˜ğ˜‚ğ—®ğ—¹ ğ—Ÿğ—¶ğ˜ƒğ—² ğ—¦ğ˜ğ—¿ğ—²ğ—®ğ—ºğ—¶ğ—»ğ—´/ğ—¦ğ—¼ğ—°ğ—¶ğ—®ğ—¹ ğ—£ğ—¹ğ—®ğ˜ğ—³ğ—¼ğ—¿ğ—º Welcome to the next evolution of streaming! Take your community 'virtual' in a hosted, cinema themed 3D space! Current Features - Text and Voice communication (3d spatial sound) - Dedicated theater hosting for users to start and stop - Streaming service API integration for chat and video - Direct streaming of video feed through an OBS of your choice into your theater - Customizable theater options and administration - VR Support (early development) - Progression and level tracking system currently based on view time - Avatar customization and clothing option (Press P) More features to come, as we are in Alpha phase we are looking for more testers and ideas!
